title: How Creators Should Prepare for a Market Crash
description: I sent out a memo to the creator economy a few weeks ago that had a lot of creators talking about how they should be preparing for a potential recession. So many creators hit me up with additional questions and concerns so I created this episode to chat through the thoughts and insights I've been sharing so far. Hope every creator takes a moment to watch and evaluate their own business while preparing for hard times.
dc:creator: Reed Duchscher and Blake Robbins
